Connect Four is a two-player game. The pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within a column. The objective of the game is to be the first to form a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line of four of one's own discs. In a board, player 1, you, plays with symbol X, while player 2, your opponent, plays with symbol O. Your input is just a number from 0 to 6, nothing else.
